tricks.desc: Use `git rebase -i` to tidy up your work-tree!
tricks.author: B.Huang

trans.cn: 使用 `git rebase -i` 命令整理你的git工作树！
永远写一个有意义的提交消息。

tricks.desc: Practice good code hygiene by following coding standards and conventions.
tricks.author: N.Chen

trans.cn: 通过遵循编码标准和约定来练习良好的代码卫生。

tricks.desc: Regularly backup your important data on cloud to prevent data loss.
tricks.author: N.Chen

trans.cn: 定期云备份重要数据以防止数据丢失。

tricks.desc: Collaboration and communication are key to successful software development.
tricks.author: N.Chen

trans.cn: 协作和沟通是成功的软件开发的关键。
